4d886792-a260-4107-81e3-3d8c2257015f.description: Plone is an open-source content management system (CMS) with over 20 years of stability and security wrapped in a modern, powerful user-centric package with Plone 6. It continues to set the standard for content management systems by offering the most functionality and customization out of the box.
4d886792-a260-4107-81e3-3d8c2257015f.title: Plone.org

b0b71bd1-69c0-418e-9167-1b469296a2b0.plaintext: The iframe block acts as a window, displaying content from a different source, like a video, map, or even another full webpage, without redirecting the user. This allows for seamless integration of external content into a website.

title: IFrame
